data.name: XRegion
desc: manages multiple rectangles which make up a region.

methods.name: clear
desc: makes this region an empty region.

methods.name: excludeRectangle
desc: removes the area of the specified rectangle from this region.

methods.name: excludeRegion
desc: removes the area of the specified region from this region.

methods.name: getBounds
desc: returns the bounding box of the shape.

methods.name: getRectangles
desc: returns all rectangles which are making up this region.

methods.name: intersectRectangle
desc: intersects the specified rectangle with the current region.

methods.name: intersectRegion
desc: intersects the specified region with the current region.

methods.name: move
desc: moves this region by the specified horizontal and vertical delta.

methods.name: unionRectangle
desc: adds the specified rectangle to this region.

methods.name: unionRegion
desc: adds the specified region to this region.

methods.name: xOrRectangle
desc: applies an exclusive-or operation with the specified rectangle to this region.

methods.name: xOrRegion
desc: applies an exclusive-or operation with the specified region to this region.
